name: Portal Guns
description:
This is "Portal Guns", a game I made in a month with Unity.

You control an experiment human that tries to escape Aberdure Laboratories.

Also it's multiplayer.

Also it's a Battle Royale.

CONTROLS

W/A/S/D/Arrows : Move 

Space : Jump

Left Click / Right Click : Place Portals, shoot with gun, stab with knife, etc...

Mouse Wheel : Change Item

Shift (Hold) : Naruto Run

R (If you are stuck) : Teleports back towards level (HP becomes 1)

HOW I MADE THE GAME

(Coming soon on my youtube!)
